summary: A group of teenagers go on a excursion to the mountains. There, they are attacked by birds infected with a lethal virus. When the teens reach a nearby village, the haunting birds start passing their virus on to all the dwellers.
cast: Clare Carey|Lance Guest|Jonathon Trent|Sarah Butler|Rebekah Kochan|Bill Posley|Brent Lydic|Gabriel Costin|Calin Stanciu|Bart Sidles|Tarri Markel|Serban Celea|Vasile Albinet|Filip Ciprian Florian|Roxana Iancu|Jack Lazzaro|Cristian Motiu|Razvan Oprea|George Remes|Christopher Troxler|Bogdan Uritescu|Mihai Verbintschi
title: Flu Bird Horror
